mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TPAGOODSKINDS( /* pahalfcommon.xml : pahalfcommon.insertStdItemList by PaHalfCommonController-goodsKinds-stdItem-list */ PA_GROUP_CODE , PA_LMSD_KEY , PA_LGROUP , PA_MGROUP , PA_SGROUP , PA_DGROUP , PA_LGROUP_NAME , PA_MGROUP_NAME , PA_SGROUP_NAME , PA_DGROUP_NAME , USE_YN , INSERT_DATE , INSERT_ID , MODIFY_DATE , MODIFY_ID , CERT_YN , BEEF_TRACE_YN , MEDICAL_YN , CHILD_CERT_YN , ELECTRIC_CERT_YN , LIFE_CERT_YN , REMARK , HEALTH_YN , FOOD_YN ) VALUES( #{paGroupCode , jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{paLmsdKey , jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{paLgroup , jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{paMgroup , jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{paSgroup , jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '' , #{paLgroupName , jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{paMgroupName , jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{paSgroupName , jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '' , #{useYn , jdbcType=VARCHAR} , SYSDATE , #{insertId , jdbcType=VARCHAR} , SYSDATE , #{modifyId , jdbcType=VARCHAR} , '0' , '0' , '0' , '0' , '0' , '0' , '0' , '0' , '0' )

INSERT INTO TPAHALFSHIPINFO/* pahalfcommon.xml : pahalfcommon.insertTpaHalfShipInfo by PaHalfCommonController */ ( ENTP_CODE , SHIP_MAN_SEQ , RETURN_MAN_SEQ , SHIP_COST_CODE , PA_SHIP_COST_CODE , TRANS_TARGET_YN , INSERT_DATE , INSERT_ID , LAST_SHIP_COST_SYNC_DATE , LAST_ENTP_SYNC_DATE , MODIFY_DATE , MODIFY_ID , PA_CODE , NO_SHIP_JEJU_ISLAND ) SELECT OE.ENTP_CODE , OE.ENTP_MAN_SEQ AS SHIP_MAN_SEQ , IE.ENTP_MAN_SEQ AS RETURN_MAN_SEQ , #{shipCostCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , NULL , '1' , SYSDATE , 'PAHALF' , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , SYSDATE , 'PAHALF' , #{paCode , jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{noShipJejuIsland , jdbcType=VARCHAR} FROM TENTPUSER OE , TENTPUSER IE WHERE OE.ENTP_CODE = IE.ENTP_CODE AND OE.ENTP_CODE = #{entpCode , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND OE.ENTP_MAN_SEQ = #{shipManSeq , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND OE.ENTP_MAN_GB = '30' AND IE.ENTP_MAN_SEQ = #{returnManSeq, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND IE.ENTP_MAN_GB = '20'
mapper.select: SELECT /* pahalfcommon.xml : pahalfcommon.selectHalfShipCostInfo by PaHalfCommonController */ HS.PA_SHIP_COST_CODE , HS.ENTP_CODE , HS.SHIP_MAN_SEQ , HS.RETURN_MAN_SEQ , HS.SHIP_COST_CODE , PA.ORD_COST , PA.SHIP_COST_BASE_AMT , PA.RETURN_COST , PA.ISLAND_COST , PA.JEJU_COST , PA.CHANGE_COST , PA.SHIP_COST_RECEIPT , SUBSTR(PA.SHIP_COST_CODE,1,2) AS SHIP_COST_FLAG , OE.POST_NO , NVL(OE.ROAD_POST_ADDR, OE.POST_ADDR) AS ADDR , DECODE (OE.ROAD_ADDR_YN,'1', OE.ROAD_ADDR, OE.ADDR) AS ADDR_DT , IE.POST_NO AS RET_POST_NO , NVL(IE.ROAD_POST_ADDR, IE.POST_ADDR) AS RET_ADDR , DECODE (IE.ROAD_ADDR_YN,'1', IE.ROAD_ADDR, IE.ADDR) AS RET_ADDR_DT , NVL(OE.ENTP_MAN_HP1 || OE.ENTP_MAN_HP2 || OE.ENTP_MAN_HP3 , OE.ENTP_MAN_DDD || OE.ENTP_MAN_TEL1 || OE.ENTP_MAN_TEL2 ) AS HP , NVL(IE.ENTP_MAN_HP1 || IE.ENTP_MAN_HP2 || IE.ENTP_MAN_HP3 , IE.ENTP_MAN_DDD || IE.ENTP_MAN_TEL1 || IE.ENTP_MAN_TEL2) AS RET_HP , HS.PA_CODE , #{noShipJejuIsland , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS NO_SHIP_JEJU_ISLAND FROM TPAHALFSHIPINFO HS , TPACUSTSHIPCOST PA , TENTPUSER OE , TENTPUSER IE WHERE PA.ROWID = (SELECT PAA.ROWID FROM TPACUSTSHIPCOST PAA WHERE HS.ENTP_CODE = PAA.ENTP_CODE AND HS.SHIP_COST_CODE = PAA.SHIP_COST_CODE AND HS.PA_CODE = PAA.PA_CODE AND ROWNUM = 1) AND OE.ENTP_CODE = HS.ENTP_CODE AND OE.ENTP_MAN_SEQ = HS.SHIP_MAN_SEQ AND IE.ENTP_CODE = HS.ENTP_CODE AND IE.ENTP_MAN_SEQ = HS.RETURN_MAN_SEQ AND OE.ENTP_MAN_GB = '30' AND IE.ENTP_MAN_GB = '20' AND HS.ENTP_CODE = #{entpCode , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND HS.SHIP_MAN_SEQ = #{shipManSeq , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND HS.RETURN_MAN_SEQ = #{returnManSeq , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND HS.SHIP_COST_CODE = #{shipCostCode , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND HS.PA_CODE = #{paCode , jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND HS.NO_SHIP_JEJU_ISLAND = #{noShipJejuIsland , jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT /* pahalfcommon.xml : pahalfcommon.selectPaHalfSlipInfoList by PaHalfCommonController */ HS.ENTP_CODE , HS.PA_CODE , HS.SHIP_MAN_SEQ , HS.RETURN_MAN_SEQ , HS.SHIP_COST_CODE , HS.PA_SHIP_COST_CODE , HS.NO_SHIP_JEJU_ISLAND FROM TPAHALFSHIPINFO HS WHERE TRANS_TARGET_YN = '1'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TPAHALFBRANDMAPPING /* pahalfcommon.xml : pahalfcommon.insertPaHalfBrandMapping by PaHalfCommonController */ ( PA_CODE , BRAND_CODE , PA_BRAND_NO , BRAND_NAME , RETURN_NO_YN , REMARK1 , REMARK2 , INSERT_ID , INSERT_DATE , MODIFY_ID , MODIFY_DATE ) SELECT HB.PA_CODE , TB.BRAND_CODE , HB.PA_BRAND_NO , TB.BRAND_NAME , HB.RETURN_NO_YN , '' , '' , 'PAHALF' , SYSDATE , 'PAHALF' , SYSDATE FROM TPAHALFBRAND HB , TBRAND TB WHERE SUBSTR(HB.PA_BRAND_NAME, 1, 6) = TB.BRAND_CODE AND HB.USE_YN = '1' AND HB.PA_BRAND_NO <> ALL(SELECT BM.PA_BRAND_NO FROM TPAHALFBRANDMAPPING BM) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM TPAHALFBRANDMAPPING BM WHERE BM.PA_CODE = HB.PA_CODE AND BM.BRAND_CODE = TB.BRAND_CODE AND BM.RETURN_NO_YN = HB.RETURN_NO_YN)
mapper.select: SELECT /* pahalfcommon.xml : pahalfcommon.selectBrandFilterGoods by PaHalfCommonController */ BM.PA_CODE , GD.GOODS_CODE FROM TPAGOODSFILTERLOG PGF , TGOODS GD , TPAHALFBRANDMAPPING BM , TGOODSADDINFO GA WHERE PGF.GOODS_CODE = GD.GOODS_CODE AND BM.PA_CODE = CASE WHEN GD.SOURCING_MEDIA = '01' OR (GD.SOURCING_MEDIA = '61' AND GA.MOBILE_ETV_YN = '1') THEN 'C1' WHEN GD.SOURCING_MEDIA = '61' THEN 'C2' END AND GD.RETURN_NO_YN = BM.RETURN_NO_YN AND GD.BRAND_CODE = BM.BRAND_CODE AND PGF.PA_GROUP_CODE = '12' AND PGF.FILTER_TYPE = 'HALF-BRAND-MAPPING' AND PGF.INSERT_DATE > SYSDATE - 30 AND GD.GOODS_CODE = GA.GOODS_CODE AND PGF.FILTER_LOG_NO = (SELECT MAX(PPP.FILTER_LOG_NO) FROM TPAGOODSFILTERLOG PPP WHERE PPP.GOODS_CODE = PGF.GOODS_CODE AND PPP.INSERT_DATE > SYSDATE - 30 ) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM TPAGOODSTARGET PGT WHERE PGT.GOODS_CODE = PGF.GOODS_CODE AND PGT.PA_GROUP_CODE = '12')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TPAGOODSTARGET /* pahalfcommon.xml : pahalfcommon.insertPaHalfGoodsTarget by PaHalfCommonController */ ( PA_GROUP_CODE , PA_CODE , GOODS_CODE , PA_GOODS_CODE , PA_SALE_GB , INSERT_ID , INSERT_DATE , MODIFY_ID , MODIFY_DATE , AUTO_YN ) VALUES (#{PA_GROUP_CODE, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{PA_CODE , jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{GOODS_CODE , jdbcType=VARCHAR} , NULL , NULL , #{INSERT_ID , jdbcType=VARCHAR} , SYSDATE , #{MODIFY_ID , jdbcType=VARCHAR} , SYSDATE , '1')
